description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
Gleb Sukhodolskiy
Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
frack113 (split)
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
name: CurrentControlSet Autorun Keys Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll].*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\[Rr][Dd][Pp]\-[Tt][Cc][Pp]\\[Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm].*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\\[Ww][Dd][Ss]\\[Rr][Dd][Pp][Ww][Dd]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Aa][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Oo][Rr][Dd][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa]\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa]\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Pp][Aa][Cc][Kk][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\\[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee][Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee][Pp][Dd][Ff]\ [Ww][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ [Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc][Pp][Ww][Mm][Oo][Nn]64\_[Vv]40\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /[Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee][Pp][Dd][Ff]\ [Ww][Rr][Ii][Tt][Ee][Rr]/))) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Mm][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\_.*/ AND user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*))) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Pp][Oo][Qq][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Oo][Rr][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ee][Rr][Oo][Rr][Dd][Ee][Rr]/)) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Vv][Nn][Cc]\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Vv][Nn][Cc][Pp][Mm]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/)))))
